results.title: Welcome to Chechnya
results.creator_credit: Askold Kurov, David France, Tyler H. Walk, Alice Henty, BBC Storyville, Maylo Films, Ninety Thousand Words, David France & Joy A. Tomchin Film, Public Square Films and HBO Documentary Films
results.brief_description: This searing investigative work shadows a group of activists risking unimaginable peril to confront the ongoing anti-LGBTQ program raging in the repressive and closed Russian republic. Unfettered access and a remarkable approach to protecting anonymity exposes this under-reported atrocity–and an extraordinary group of people confronting evil.

constellations_primary.name: Welcome to Chechnya: tales through time
constellations_primary.description: Documentary Welcome to Chechnya used ground-breaking deep fake technology to hide the identities of LGBTQ+ people fleeing a government-orchestrated genocide in Chechnya.

results.title: The Rainmaker
results.creator_credit: Aggie Guerard Rodgers, Michael Douglas, Fred Fuchs, Howard Cummings, Steven Reuther, Michael Herr, Francis Ford Coppola, Constellation Entertainment and Paramount
results.brief_description: When Rudy Baylor, a young attorney with no clients, goes to work for a seedy ambulance chaser, he wants to help the parents of a terminally ill boy in their suit against an insurance company. But to take on corporate America, Rudy and a scrappy paralegal must open their own law firm.

constellations_other.name: Wong Kar-Wai's Hollywood fingerprints
constellations_other.description: Wong Kar-wai’s modern masterpiece In The Mood For Love is a rich, romantic melodrama that follows the entangled lives of two neighbours (Tony Leung and Maggie Cheung) who develop feelings for each other after learning their spouses are having an affair.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Aggie Guerard Rodgers, Michael Douglas, Fred Fuchs, Howard Cummings, Steven Reuther, Michael Herr, Francis Ford Coppola, Constellation Entertainment and Paramount

results.title: The Night of the Hunter
results.creator_credit: Paul Gregory, Charles Laughton, James Agee, United Artists and Paul Gregory Productions
results.brief_description: In the Deep South, a serial-killing preacher hunts two young children who know the whereabouts of a stash of money.

results.title: The Death and Life of Marsha P. Johnson
results.creator_credit: Mark Blane, David France, James O'Donnell, Public Square Films, Ninety Thousand Words, Race Point Films, Faliro House Productions and Terasem Media & Films
results.brief_description: Describing herself as a ‘street queen,’ Johnson was a legendary fixture in New York City’s gay ghetto and a tireless voice for LGBT pride since the days of Stonewall, who along with fellow trans icon Sylvia Rivera, founded Street Transvestites Action Revolutionaries (S.T.A.R.), a trans activist group based in the heart of NYC’s Greenwich Village. Her death in 1992 was declared a suicide by the NYPD, but friends never accepted that version of events. Structured as a whodunit, with activist Victoria Cruz cast as detective and audience surrogate, The Death and Life of Marsha P. Johnson celebrates the lasting political legacy of Johnson, while seeking to finally solve the mystery of her unexplained death.

constellations_other.name: Welcome to Chechnya: tales through time
constellations_other.description: Documentary Welcome to Chechnya used ground-breaking deep fake technology to hide the identities of LGBTQ+ people fleeing a government-orchestrated genocide in Chechnya.

results.title: Stieg Larsson: The Man Who Played with Fire
results.creator_credit: Nathan Grossman, Olof Berglind, Metha Engqvist Griffiths, Henrik Georgsson, TV4, Nordsvensk Filmunderhållning, Generalissimo, C More Entertainment, Film i Väst and B-Reel Films
results.brief_description: A documentary about the Millennium Trilogy author Stieg Larsson and his pioneering work fighting right-wing extremists and neo-Nazis, an obsession with fatal consequences.

constellations_other.name: Collective: investigative journalism on screen
constellations_other.description: In Collective, documentarian Alexander Nanau follows a team of journalists who uncover a far-reaching government conspiracy following a deadly nightclub fire in Romania that kills dozens.

results.title: Rust and Bone
results.creator_credit: Martine Cassinelli, Alix Raynaud, Pascal Caucheteux, Craig Davidson, Jacques Audiard, Thomas Bidegain, Virginie Montel, Michel Barthélémy, France Télévisions, RTBF, Canal+, Casa Kafka Pictures Movie Tax Shelter Empowered by Dexia, Département des Alpes-Maritimes, Région Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur, Vlaams Audiovisueel fonds, VOO, Centre du Cinéma et de l'Audiovisuel de la Fédération Wallonie-Bruxelles, Ciné+, Lunanime, Lumière, Page 114, France 2 Cinéma, Les Films du Fleuve and Why Not Productions
results.brief_description: Put in charge of his young son, Ali leaves Belgium for Antibes to live with his sister and her husband as a family. Ali’s bond with Stephanie, a killer whale trainer, grows deeper after Stephanie suffers a horrible accident.

results.creator_credit: Jeremy Cox, Emily Freund, Ashley Fox, Michael Perry, Josey McNamara, Ben Browning, Tom Ackerley, Margot Robbie, Emerald Fennell, Nancy Steiner, FilmNation Entertainment and LuckyChap Entertainment

results.title: Lost in Translation
results.creator_credit: Ross Katz, Nancy Steiner, Sofia Coppola, Anne Ross, K.K. Barrett, Francis Ford Coppola, Elemental Films, Tohokushinsha Film Corporation, Focus Features and American Zoetrope
results.headline_credit: Japan and United States of America, 2003
results.brief_description: Two lost souls visiting Tokyo — the young, neglected wife of a photographer and a washed-up movie star shooting a TV commercial — find an odd solace and pensive freedom to be real in each other’s company, away from their lives in America.

constellations_other.name: Wong Kar-Wai's Hollywood fingerprints
constellations_other.description: Wong Kar-wai’s modern masterpiece In The Mood For Love is a rich, romantic melodrama that follows the entangled lives of two neighbours (Tony Leung and Maggie Cheung) who develop feelings for each other after learning their spouses are having an affair.

results.title: Hamilton
results.creator_credit: Lin-Manuel Miranda, Paul Tazewell, David Korins, Thomas Kail, Jeffrey Seller, RadicalMedia, The Public Theatre and Walt Disney Pictures
results.brief_description: Presenting the tale of American founding father Alexander Hamilton, this filmed version of the original Broadway smash hit is the story of America then, told by America now.

constellations_other.name: Assassins: real world manifestations
constellations_other.description: Ryan White’s documentary Assassins breaks down the wild true story of the assassination of North Korea’s Kim John-nam, diving into the political and personal motivations behind the event.

results.title: Disclosure
results.creator_credit: Amy Scholder, Avram Finklestein, Sam Feder, Sofia Midon, Disclosure Film, Field of Vision and Bow + Arrow Entertainment
results.brief_description: An investigation of how Hollywood’s fabled stories have deeply influenced how Americans feel about transgender people, and how transgender people have been taught to feel about themselves.
